ComicInfo.Title: Wyrmwood, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie learns that another Estacado in a much earlier time had helped create the mysterious town called Wyrmwood that seems to exist outside the real world; Now the current inhabitants want Jackie to release them into real world so they can spread chaos; Instead, Jackie swallows the whole town back inside himself using the Darkness to end the threat and save Jenny.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 21:36:07. [CVDB118675]
ComicInfo.Inker: Andy Owens, John Livesay, Jon Sibal, Marco Galli, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.Colorist: Jimmy Yu, John Starr, Matt Nelson
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Joe Benitez, Joe Weems, Matt Nelson
ComicInfo.Characters: Antonio Estacado, Emil Cruikshank, Jackie Estacado, Jedidiah McMahon, Jenny Romano, Mandolin
